User information
Check the fields of the user information you want to include as columns in the export file.
Scoring & radio button groups

When you have provided scoring points to answers in questions which use groups with radio buttons, it can be useful to combine these scoring points in one column. This is especially recommended when using a statistical program like SPSS to calculate the results. Even when you didn't provide scoring points, this function is very useful. It combines all given answers into one column with questions where only one answer can be provided. Otherwise you end up with a lot of columns.
